me.prettyprint.hom.converters
Interface Converter<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultConverter, JodaTimeHectorConverter
public interface Converter<T>

Interface defining a custom object mapper conversion. For instance, from an enum to a string.

Author:
Todd Burruss
